DESCRIPTION: Set a language/personality for your server.
ALIASES: Setlanguage does not have any aliases.
INVALID_NAME: There was no language/personality found for **{{name}}**. If you are looking to create this language please contact us on our support server using the invite command.
ALREADY_ACTIVE: The {{name}} language/personality is already set on this server.
SET: The {{name}} has been set on this server.
